file_content.text:
CAUTION! MALFUNCTIONING DROIDS IN AREA!
We've got berserk maintenance droids. Sabotage? If anyone well-armed wants to help investigate, I would be extremely grateful.
If you can take the droids apart, drop their memory cores off in the Lower City. I'll collect the cores later, and make sure your account is credited. Thanks--Chief Maintenance Officer Harro

CAUTION!
Maintenance droids are malfunctioning in this area. They're designed to haul heavy pipe work, they can break a man in half.
Those droids have some bad glitches, but turning violent is a new one. It's possible someone's been reprogramming them.
I'd advise finding a safer route. If anyone well-armed wants to help investigate what's up with the droids, I can provide details. And credits.
I need memory cores from those maintenance droids to trace who's been messing with them. It's high-risk so I'm offering good money.
If you can take the droids apart, drop their memory cores off in the Lower City. I'll collect the cores later, and make sure your account is credited. Thanks.
